author: Fox News Staff
title: Chris Christie sends message to Dems: Follow Obama's advice, tell this story to voters

sentence: The former president has officially endorsed former Senator David Perdue over Governor Brian Kemp in Georgia and Lieutenant Governor Janice McGeachin over Governor Brad Little in Idaho.
author: Andrew Stanton
title: Donald Trump's 'Emotional' Endorsements Will 'Backfire': Chris Christie

sentence: Former President Donald Trump has blasted Republican Georgia Governor Brian Kemp as a "real RINO" as Kemp's campaign continues against Trump-backed GOP primary challenger David Perdue.
author: Aila Slisco
title: Donald Trump Launches Fresh Attack on 'Real RINO' Georgia Gov Brian Kemp

sentence: In a statement announcing the May 23 rally, Pence called Kemp one of the most successful conservative governors in America.? "Brian Kemp is my friend, a man dedicated to faith, family and the people of Georgia,? Pence said.
author: Ella Lee
title: Pence will go toe-to-toe with Trump in Georgia as he announces rally with GOP Gov. Brian Kemp

sentence: I am proud to offer my full support for four more years of Brian Kemp as governor of the great state of Georgia!? The news comes as Pence has taken steps to distance himself from Trump as the former congressman and Indiana governor considers a 2024 presidential run that could put him into direct competition with his former boss.
title: Pence to rally with Kemp in Georgia in break with Trump

sentence: If Brian Kemp gets over the finish line in the fashion that I believe is possible,? he said, It speaks volumes to the good people of Georgia.?
author: Matthew Brown
title: Inside the Republican push to stop Trumps vendetta tour in Georgia
